original_text: O sing unto the Lord a new song; for he hath done marvellous things: his right hand, and his holy arm, hath gotten him the victory.
korean_text: 새 노래로 여호와께 찬송하라 그는 기이한 일을 행하사 그의 오른손과 거룩한 팔로 자기를 위하여 구원을 베푸셨음이로다

sentences.original_text: O sing unto the Lord a new song
for he hath done marvellous things
his right hand, and his holy arm
